name: Fringe Defence Syndicate - Return of the Syndicate
author: Original author: Johny Cocks, Return of the Syndicate: MnHebi
description: The Fringe Defence Syndicate originally by Johny Cocks(Johny Cocas on forums). Return of the Syndicate that updates the mod to Starsector 0.97 by MnHebi. LazyLib and MagicLib Required!
